notes: The Dictionary of Twitterese 1.0 is the first attempt at a lexicographic description of non-standard Slovene as found on Twitter. Version 1.0 contains 1,002 entries, of which 499 were generated automatically, while 503 have manually added fields, in particular the definition, various labels, variant spellings, and selected examples of use.
